#summary Add Researcher
#labels Use-Case

*Case Number:* UC002

*Case Name:* Add New Researcher Profile

*Description:* Add a profile for an ISERN member.

*Actors:*
  * Researcher – An ISERN member
  * System – The MyISERN application

*Frequency:* Average

*Preconditions:* 
  * The researcher is an ISERN member.
  * The researcher is viewing the homepage.
  * The researcher's profile does not exist in the system.

*Postconditions:*
  * The researcher's profile is added to the system.
  * The researcher's organization is added if it does not exist.

*Basic Course:*
|| *User* || *System* ||
|| 1. The researcher clicks on the create new researcher link. || 2. The system displays the new researcher form. ||
|| 3. The researcher enters their name, biography statement, and email, then uploads their picture, lists links to recent publications, and selects their organization from a list. ||  ||
|| 4. The researcher clicks on the save button. || 5. The system adds the researcher information. ||
||  || 6. The system tells the user that the addition succeeds, and returns the user to the homepage. ||

*Alternate Course A:*
|| *User* || *System* ||
|| A.3. The researcher does not find their organization on the list and selects the option stating that their organization is not on the list. ||  ||
|| A.4. The researcher clicks on the save button. || A.5. The system temporarily saves the researcher information ||
||  || A.6. The system displays the add organization form. ||
|| A.7. The researcher enters the organization name, location, country, web page, what the organization does, and selects the organization status. ||  ||
|| A.8. The researcher clicks on the save button. || A.9. The system adds the organization information. ||
||  || A.10. The system adds the researcher information with the organization name. ||
||  || A.11. The system tells the user that the addition succeeds and displays the homepage. ||
